title: Who Stole my Magic?
description: It's happened to almost everyone—a breakup that's seemingly impossible to recover from. Whether you've been together two months or ten years too long, there's a post-relationship limbo you need to survive in order to get on with your life.Every girl has a story to tell, but everyone agrees—sure, it's hard to do, but it's definitely not impossible to overcome.Jenny Manuel gathers the true and outstanding tales of women conquering breakups—from the mild to the truly horrific.
author: Jenny Manuel
